original_text: He should not drink too much wine. He must not get angry quickly or quarrel with people. Instead he should be kind to people. He must not want lots of money.
korean_text: 술을 즐기지 아니하며 구타하지 아니하며 오직 관용하며 다투지 아니하며 돈을 사랑하지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: He should not drink too much wine.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 너무 많은 포도주를 마시지 말아야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: He must not get angry quickly
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 금방 화를 내지 말아야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: Instead he should be kind to people.
He must not want lots of money.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 많은 돈을 원해서는 안 됩니다.
